one_reviews_text: First minutes are intriguing, in a "it's weird, but I kinda like it" way. But then, when you learn the controls, it's fantastic experience with amazing and funny theme. Testing agility and figuring out how to progress through the map is really addicting. Absolutely love it and it counts as an arm workout too, trust me!

Easily in my top 5 vr experiences. The level design and gameplay is second to none. I came into it on the quest 1 expecting to get immediately motion sick and played 3 hours in what seemed like the blink of an eye. A very polished simple game disign with an excelent visual style. !FIVE OUTA FIVE!

Have you ever wanted to float around a cell shaded space station, avoiding death traps while helping the motherland! wait no more!
I really enjoyed spidermaning with plungers. While the gameplay is simple, it's very easy to pick up and doesn't get boring.

review_title: A fantastic game not to be missed!
one_reviews_text: This is quite literally one of the most fun VR games I've played. Love the art/graphics, the sound, the voice acting, and of course the wonderful game mechanics!

This game is awesome. Most games I complete the objectives and not touch it again, but with this game I played it over and over. I have completed the game start to finishing 3 times now, and soon to be a 4th, 5th, and 6th time. I love how much skill it takes to play this game, and how rewarding it is to master the game. If you have plans on buying this game I highly recommended it.

Awesome! art style is better than 95% of VR games. Mechanics and locomotion system are well implemented and extremely fun to play + a lot of levels to explore. Must have  sci-fi exploration adventure.

1st Impressions Gameplay with Commentary // Oculus Rift S // RTX 2070 Super:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x9L4PxpN8bc

My Initial Impressions:
Its nice to come across an experience that is refreshing and new and not afraid to explore new ways to traverse the environment in VR whilst making that world a puzzle in itself.
